snippet: The results for the world’s largest steel company were hurt by continued losses in Europe, which continues to be a challenging environment.
lead_paragraph: The results for the world’s largest steel company were hurt by continued losses in Europe, which continues to be a challenging environment.

headline.main: ArcelorMittal Reports 2nd Quarter Net Loss of $780 Million
headline.print_headline: ArcelorMittal Reports 2nd Quarter Net Loss of $780 Million
